zone.title: Upload Your Instagram ZIP
zone.description: Your data remains 100% private. We analyze your Instagram ZIP file locally in your browser.
zone.dropHere: Drop your Instagram ZIP file here
zone.orBrowse: Or tap to browse your local storage.
zone.processingHint: Processing large datasets (up to 1M+) can take a moment.

errors.commonHint: If your export has 0 followers, you likely exported in HTML format or didn't select the "Followers and following" information category.

html.title: HTML instead of JSON
html.description: Make sure to select "JSON" format when requesting your data

missingData.title: Missing data category
missingData.description: You need to select "Followers and following" in the data types

wrongFile.title: Wrong file
wrongFile.description: Upload the .zip file, not a folder or extracted files

waiting.title: Waiting for Instagram...
waiting.description: Instagram is preparing your data export. You'll receive an email within 48 hours (usually much faster!).
waiting.reminderHint: Remind me to check in 2 days
waiting.calendarDetails: Check your email for Instagram data export and upload to Unfollow Tracker
waiting.haveFileHint: If you already downloaded the ZIP export from your email, jump straight to analysis.
waiting.proTip: Pro Tip: Check your Spam Folder
waiting.proTipHint: Instagram emails often end up there. Look for emails from Meta or Instagram. The download link expires in 4 days.
